/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional green and blue accents, reflecting the urban architecture of the city. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, hinting at a touch of nature amidst the concrete jungle.
